trans-unit.source: Describes the version of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a versão de um <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The DataRowVersion values are used when retrieving the value found in a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> using <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de DataRowVersion são utilizados quando a obter o valor encontrado num <xref:System.Data.DataRow>utilizando <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A>do <xref:System.Data.DataRow>objeto.</xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The DataRowVersion informs you what version of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> exists.
trans-unit.target: O DataRowVersion informa-o qual a versão de um <xref:System.Data.DataRow>existe.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: Versions change under the following circumstances: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method, if you change the value, the `Current` and `Proposed` values become available.
trans-unit.target: Versões alterar nas seguintes circunstâncias: - depois de chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A>método, se alterar o valor, o `Current` e `Proposed` valores fiquem disponíveis.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is deleted.
trans-unit.target: -Após chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A>método, o `Proposed` valor é eliminado.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> method, the Proposed value becomes the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: -Após chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A>método, o valor de Proposed fica o `Current` valor.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: -Após chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>método, o `Original` valor fica idêntico da `Current` valor.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
trans-unit.target: -Após chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataTable>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A>método, o `Original` valor fica idêntico da `Current` valor.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is discarded, and the version becomes `Current`.
trans-unit.target: -Após chamar o <xref:System.Data.DataRow>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A>método, o `Proposed` valor é ignorado e a versão fica `Current`.</xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow>
A linha contém os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowState" name="DataRowState" href=""></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Added" name="Added" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Modified" name="Modified" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Deleted" name="Deleted" href=""></xref>, the default version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowState" name="DataRowState" href=""></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Added" name="Added" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Modified" name="Modified" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Deleted" name="Deleted" href=""></xref>, the default version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Detached" name="Detached" href=""></xref>, the version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Proposed" name="Proposed" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Detached" name="Detached" href=""></xref>, the version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Proposed" name="Proposed" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row contains its original values.
trans-unit.target: A linha contém os valores originais.

trans-unit.source: The row contains a proposed value.
trans-unit.target: A linha contém um valor proposto.
